attributes.action: cut the number of MP's by two thirds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we need 600+ MP's? Any other business would be looking for savings, particularly with the advent of new twchonolgy, (email, utube etc.). The savings would shadow anything we could save by reigning in expenses

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
